subject: Television
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: A report by the CBS news program “60 Minutes” cited two sources as saying that Alex Rodriguez implicated Ryan Braun and Francisco Cervelli in the Biogenesis doping scandal.
snippet: A report by the CBS news program “60 Minutes” cited two sources as saying that Alex Rodriguez implicated Ryan Braun and Francisco Cervelli in the Biogenesis doping scandal.
